bibl.title: Dreams, Bilingualism, and Oneiromancy in Ptolemaic Egypt: Remarks on a Recent Study.
bibl.note: À propos de: Stephen Kidd, Dreams in Bilingual Papyri from the Ptolemaic Period. Avec résumé en anglais, BASP 48 (2011) pp. 113-130. - I. Introduction. - II. The case studies: Ptolemaic bilingual dream accounts: 1. The Cairo letter; - 2. The archive of the enkatochoi: the dreams of Nektembes; - 3. The archive of the enkatochoi: the Dream of Nektanebos; - 4. The archive of the enkatochoi: the demotic dream accounts. - III. The theory of ""linguistic dream interpretation"". - IV. Oneirocritica and oneiro-languages: Demotic vs. Greek? - V. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Luigi Prada, Dreams, Bilingualism, and Oneiromancy in Ptolemaic Egypt: Remarks on a Recent Study.

À propos de: Stephen Kidd, Dreams in Bilingual Papyri from the Ptolemaic Period. Avec résumé en anglais, BASP 48 (2011) pp. 113-130. - I. Introduction. - II. The archive of the enkatochoi: the Dream of Nektanebos; - 4. The archive of the enkatochoi: the demotic dream accounts. - III. The theory of ""linguistic dream interpretation"". - IV.
